title: @Riot - Seriously, this Lunar Revel Log-In Screen is awesome!
body: The music is awesome. The colors are awesome. The reference to traditional Eastern Asian for the style is awesome. Most of all though, I LOVE THE ANIMATION OF THE WAVES. Keep it up!

replies.body: Thanks so much for digging our work on this, Jasiwel!

Thanks for the response! I always love seeing Red posts on these forums (or anywhere really). Could you also send a "OMG THAT'S SO COOL" to the skin team that made Wukong's flying cloud? Like, I seriously contemplated buying Wukong for the skin alone. Alas, Arcade Miss Fortune and Iron Scale Shyvana had to happen first. :S

> Could you also send a "OMG THAT'S SO COOL" to the skin team that made Wukong's flying cloud?

Will do!

Awesome! 

Just a quick question though, which Eastern Asian art were you guys looking at when you did this Log-In Screen? Kanagawa's the Great Wave immediately comes to mind, but it has a lot of qualities found in Kakemonos across Japan. I just don't want to assume your inspirations were primarily Japanese based because Korea/China has beautiful and similar art as well.
